channel.title: Dylan Huang
channel.description: Web enthusiast, Computer Engineer, Dog Lover

item.title: ARM Internship
item.description: On May 22, 2017, I will be starting my internship for Arm Holdings as a Server Performance Intern for the span of Summer 2017. The position is located in Austin, Texas.

item.title: Google Summer of Code Internship
item.description:
• Worked on data integration to allow quick and scalable calculations of data for the Data Platform and Dashboard Widgets

• Ruby on Rails, JavaSript, and Data integration platform experience

item.title: Research with UIUC CS Department
item.description:
• Designed website that hosts a control panel to filter a twitter handle’s news feed through algorithmically generated sentiment/friend groups and tweet metadata

• Investigating user preference and the possible placebo effect of a control panel

• Technologies: JavaScript, AJAX, PHP, and MySQL

• Currently refactoring entire website with Ruby on Rails
